meanings.definition: Aguacates: the edible fruit of a tropical American tree, pear-shaped and containing a large seed.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating aguacates with my salad.
meanings.sent2: She bought some aguacates from the market for guacamole.
meanings.sent3: The aguacates were having a party in the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The aguacates on the tree looked like green lanterns in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of aguacates makes them a popular ingredient in many dishes.

meanings.definition: Aguacates: a tropical American tree bearing aguacates.
meanings.sent1: The aguacates provide shade in the hot summer months.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new aguacates tree in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The aguacates tree whispered secrets to the mango tree next to it.
meanings.sent4: The aguacates tree stood tall like a guardian of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the aguacates blossoms filled the air with sweetness.
